attributes.action: Consult urgently with the Environment Agency to stop the proposed fishing licence for under 16's.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposed licence will discourage young anglers and kill off the sport. Remember that VAT is paid on most goods & services including tackle, equipment, clothing, public tansport, day tickets etc. Any EA shortfall should be taken up by adult anglers licence. All EA spending should be transparent - see petition by James Deans.
